frail.name: Frail
frail.description: Your body is weaker than others

options.name: Fireball
options.description: A burst of flame that deals fire damage.

options.name: Lightning Bolt
options.description: A streak of lightning that deals lightning damage.

arrogance.name: Arrogance
arrogance.description: You believe you are superior to others
arrogance.effect: Disadvantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks with authority figures

code-of-honor.name: Code of Honor
code-of-honor.effect: Cannot gain advantage from stealth attacks

naive-idealism.name: Naive Idealism
naive-idealism.description: You always expect the best from people
naive-idealism.effect: Disadvantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to detect deception

greed.name: Greed
greed.effect: Disadvantage on resisting theft or bribery

recklessness.name: Recklessness
recklessness.effect: Disadvantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks in dangerous situations

dogmatic.name: Dogmatic
dogmatic.effect: Cannot lie or deceive, and must always attempt to convert non-believers

zealotry.name: Zealotry
zealotry.description: Your faith is unshakeable, but blinding
zealotry.effect: Cannot be convinced by non-religious arguments, and may become hostile towards opposing faiths

perfectionist.name: Perfectionist
perfectionist.effect: Disadvantage on recovery checks after a failed performance

stage-fright.name: Stage Fright
stage-fright.effect: Disadvantage on Performance checks when alone on stage

ego.name: Ego
ego.effect: Disadvantage on group performance checks, unless you are the primary focus

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.effect: Cannot assist allies on Performance checks, and may challenge others unnecessarily

vulnerable.name: Vulnerable
vulnerable.effect: Disadvantage on Fame checks after a failed performance

melodrama.name: Melodrama
melodrama.effect: Disadvantage on Charisma (Deception) checks, as your intentions are often too obvious

impulsive.name: Impulsive
impulsive.effect: Disadvantage on patience or timing checks

distraction.name: Distraction
distraction.effect: Disadvantage on concentration checks during lengthy performances
